name: ResampleMethod

properties.description: Chooses a pixel in the center of the sample area and replaces the entire area with that pixel color. Same as subsampling.
properties.name: NEARESTNEIGHBOR

properties.description: Averages the pixels in a sample area and replaces the entire area with the average pixel color at the specified resolution. Same as average downsampling.
properties.name: BILINEAR

properties.description: Uses a weighted average to determine pixel color, which usually yields better results than the simple averageing method of downsampling.
properties.name: BICUBIC

properties.description: A good method for reducing the size of an image based on Bicubic interpolation with enhanced sharpening. Maintains the detail in a resampled image.
properties.name: BICUBICSHARPER

properties.description: A good method for enlarging images based on Bicubic interpolation but designed to produce smoother results.
properties.name: BICUBICSMOOTHER

description: The method to use to resample the image.
